docs.snippet: World shares were mostly lower Wednesday as some markets gave back early gains ahead of the Federal Reserve's first decision on interest rates since the appointment of its new chair, Jerome Powell.

headline.print_headline: World Shares Waver as Investors Await Fed Decision on Rates
headline.main: World Shares Waver as Investors Await Fed Decision on Rates

docs.snippet: France's Publicis is responding to upheaval in the advertising market with a stepped-up drive to become a consulting partner to global advertisers online, banking on the new strategy to reverse sluggish growth and boost profits.

headline.print_headline: France's Publicis Responds to Ad Market Upheaval With Push Into Consulting
headline.main: France's Publicis Responds to Ad Market Upheaval With Push Into Consulting

docs.snippet: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about today:

A 31-year-old man has been arrested and two men remain at large for burglarizing the Massachusetts home of New England Patriots star tight end Rob Gronkowski following the team's Super Bowl loss, police said.

headline.print_headline: Man Arrested for Burglarizing Patriots Gronkowski's Home
headline.main: Man Arrested for Burglarizing Patriots Gronkowski's Home

docs.snippet: A New York City firefighter was killed and five others including two firefighters were injured in a blaze in a historic building where a movie starring Bruce Willis and Alec Baldwin was being filmed, local media reported and officials said early o...

headline.print_headline: New York Firefighter Killed in Blaze on Set of Bruce Willis Movie
headline.main: New York Firefighter Killed in Blaze on Set of Bruce Willis Movie

docs.snippet: Israeli prosecutors charged a French consular driver on Monday with using a diplomatic car to elude border inspections and spirit guns from the Islamist-ruled Gaza Strip to the Israeli-occupied West Bank on behalf of a Palestinian smuggling ring.

headline.print_headline: Israel Accuses French Consulate Driver of Smuggling Guns to Palestinians
headline.main: Israel Accuses French Consulate Driver of Smuggling Guns to Palestinians

docs.snippet: A growing number of internet companies are banning cryptocurrency advertising, fearing reputational damage if their users are duped or left penniless, even as regulators struggle to get to grips with the fast-emerging industry.

headline.print_headline: Companies Clamp Down on Crypto Ads as Regulators Play Catch-Up
headline.main: Companies Clamp Down on Crypto Ads as Regulators Play Catch-Up

docs.snippet: The Catholic Church’s influence has waned, but concerns about outside interference have grown.

headline.print_headline: Fear of Foreign Influence as Irish Abortion Vote Nears
headline.main: As Irish Abortion Vote Nears, Fears of Foreign Influence Rise

docs.snippet: Two women brought three children to a mosque in Tempe, Ariz., and in a video can be heard attacking Islam.

headline.print_headline: Women Arrested After Trespassing at Arizona Mosque and Mocking Islam
headline.main: Women Arrested After Trespassing at Arizona Mosque and Mocking Islam
